question: In Indian history, who was Abdul Hamid Lahori?
option1: An important military commander during Akbarâ€™s reign
option2: An official historian of the reign of Shah Jahan
option3: An important noble and confidant of Aurangzeb
option4: A chronicler and poet during the reign of Muhammad Shah
answer: An official historian of the reign of Shah Jahan
explanation: Abdul Hamid Lahori was a traveller and historian during the period of Mughal Emperor Shah Jahan who later became a court historian of Shah Jahan. He wrote the book Padshahnama also called Badshahnama, about the reign of Shah Jahan.
